Package org.itemscript.core.template

Interface Summary
Element An element of a template that can be interpreted in a context, returning a JsonValue.
 

Class Summary
Accumulator An Accumulator is a write-only object used to accumulate extra information that should be tied to particular values in a template.
Analyzer An Analyzer takes a JsonValue and returns a template element corresponding to it.
Template A compiled template that can produce either text or a JSON value.
TemplateExec The execution context for a template, providing access to the JsonSystem, Accumulator, and potentially other template-specific facilities.
TemplateResult Holds the result of a template interpretation, including the value and the result from the Accumulator.
ValueLiteral A container for a literal JsonValue that may be contained in a template.
